§ 31316. Limitation on statutory construction This chapter does not affect the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to regulate commercial motor vehicle safety involving motor vehicles with a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 26,001 pounds or a lesser gross vehicle weight rating the Secretary decides is appropriate under section 31301(4)(A) of this title. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1029.)
